item.title: 03-判断溢出和精度误差和名词解释
item.author: 作者
item.description: 判断溢出错误和精度误差 Write out variables x, y and z in binary code int8_t x = 67; int8_t y = -7; int8_t z = y - x; int8_t x = 0xd3; uint8_t = 0xd3; int8_t x = 127; int8_t y = -7; int8_t z = y – x; float x = 1.125; float x = 23.0; float x = 0.45; Specifier Equivalent
